text.text: How to enable captions for Zoom participants:

You need to change your Zoom settings so that participants can see captions in meetings you host.

Please follow these *one-time steps* before your next Zoom meeting:

1. Click <https://zoom.us/profile/setting?tab=meeting|this link> to go to your Zoom settings, and log in if needed.
2. Click the link to the _In Meeting (Advanced)_ section, or just scroll down.
3. Under this section, enable *Closed captioning*.
4. Under *Closed captioning*, make sure all the checkboxes are checked :ballot_box_with_check:.
That's it! If you're already in a meeting where captions are needed, then just leave the meeting, rejoin, and inform any participants who need captions.
